MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G12 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Athole Gardens and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.45AM due to repairs required to electrical equipment. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.53AM on 27 February 2021.
